casebody.data:
Darryl Lloyd WHITE, an Individual, Appellant,
v.
Meghan Lynn WARD, M.D.; John Doe Ward, Husband and Wife, in Their Individual and Corporate Capacities, and their Marital Community; Michelle Doe, Medical Assistant, in Her Individual and Corporate Capacity ; Anthony Slonim, M.D. Dr. Ph, President and Chief Executive Officer, Renown Health; Jane Doe Slonim, Husband and Wife, in Their Individual and Corporate Capacities, and Their Marital Community; and Renown South Meadows Medical Center, Respondents. No. 79289 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED AUGUST 23, 2019

DISMISSED.
